Summary: it was diferents shapes silver/black with lights red ,yellow and green
divs: Sighting Detailswe were on the street coming back from the park,we live in Brooklyn, at first i thought it was an airplane from the US Air Force because it was dark with lights and looks like it was doing piruets,then it change first it take form like triangle then to a hexagone but like it was passing it looks like 7 or 9 dark balls with the changing lights, when they were far away one of then separated and turn silver,i couldn't see more because my baby was crying (I am a babysitter)it was traveling southwest to northeast. I just reporting this because I want to know if someone else saw it.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around July 1st 2008
